short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamless Simultaneous Interpretation Delivery for any browser-based meetings, events or live streams, powered by Green Terp.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamless Simultaneous Interpretation Delivery for any browser-based meetings, hybrid or virtual events or live streams, powered by Green Terp.

Receiver for simultaneous interpretation at just 1 click, designed and developed by Green Terp Technologies.

GreenTerp for Simultaneous Interpretation, developed by Green Terp Technologies, delivers simultaneous interpretation (provided by human interpreters) to online meetings (Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Google Meet, Webex, Bluejeans, GotoMeeting, etc.), events (Canapii, Gevme, ON24, Hopin, Hubilo, Intrado, etc.) and live streaming platforms (YouTube Live, Twitch, Facebook, etc.) in a seamless manner. 

Add the GreenTerp for Simultaneous Interpretation extension, and your event is SI ready! 

Participants get to listen to interpretation in different languages in the next tab as the meeting/event/stream, with automatic switching of original and interpretation audio. 

Secure end-to-end encryption of audio delivery, with optimal sound quality. 

The quickest and the easiest SI solution to hybrid or virtual events and conferences. 

How to use:
1. Click on the extension and paste the GT Mobile URL, then Click ‘Login’,
2. Select the language channel you wish to listen to,
3. Click on the meeting/event tab to continue the meeting in your preferred language

Contact your simultaneous interpretation provider to get the GT Mobile URL for the event.
